匥字的基本解释

匥
fán
古同“笲”。

匥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fán］
［《廣韻》附袁切，平元，奉。］
［《廣韻》扶晚切，上阮，奉。］
［《廣韻》皮變切，去線，並。］
亦作“匥1”。
(1)古代一种形制似筥的盛器。新妇向舅姑行贽礼时常用以盛干果等。
(2)犹严密。

匥字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匚字部】　匥； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页153第31
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?皮變切，音卞。【博雅】笥也。【廣韻】竹器。又【玉篇】冠器。與笲通。

匥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
匥字的起名意思

暂无。

匥
Basic explanation of words
匥
fán
The ancient same as the "li".
匥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fán］
["Guang Yun" with Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, Feng. ]
["Guangyun" help the evening cut, go to Ruan, Feng. ]
["Guangyun" The skin is cut, the thread is removed, and the. ]
Also known as "匥1".
(1) An ancient container shaped like a 筥. When brides give gifts to their uncles, they often use dried fruits and so on.
(2) Still tight.
匥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [匚字部] 　匥; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 153 31
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The skin changes and the sound is Bian. 【Bo Ya】Zhe Ye. [Guangyun] Bamboo ware. Also 【Jade articles】Crown. And Litong.
